text: kya ve tumhaare rab kee dayaaluta ko baantate hai? saansaarik jeevan mein unake jeevan-yaapan ke saadhan hamane unake beech baante hai aur hamane unamen se kuchh logon ko doosare kuchh logon se shreniyon kee drshti se uchch rakha hai, taaki unamen se ve ek-doosare se kaam len. aur tumhaare rab kee dayaaluta usase kaheen uttam hai jise ve samet rahe hai
